story_zako_battle_23_02/3701_0101_0100_1:
Yo, y’all like how I look, dawgs?!
I’m dope and phat and fly, right?!
story_zako_battle_23_02/3701_0101_0200_1: I’m dope and phat and fly, right?!
story_zako_battle_23_02/3701_0101_0300_1: I’m dope and phat and fly, right?!
story_zako_battle_23_02/3801_0101_0100_1:
Hey, girrrl!
You look like you have an eye for fashion!
We got something you might like!
story_zako_battle_23_02/3801_0101_0200_1:
See this fine gentleman right here? He’s a
famous fashion designer! And he’s, like, way more
popular than Valerie.
story_zako_battle_23_02/3801_0101_0300_1:
Anyway, he thinks you got somethin’ special about
you, so he’s offerin’ you a huge discount on a
sweet outfit. They usually cost a fortune, y’know!
story_zako_battle_23_02/3801_0101_0400_1:
Oh my gosh! Really? Me?
Yes! I’ll buy it!
story_zako_battle_23_02/3801_0101_0500_1:
Hold on... Hey, you! What’re you lookin’ at!
This ain’t a show!
story_zako_battle_23_02/3801_0501_0100_1: Oh no! My clothes! They’re ruined!
story_zako_battle_23_02/3801_0501_0200_1:
Oh wow! Look at your clothes! Your outfits
are so much better than theirs!
story_zako_battle_23_02/3801_0501_0300_1: I have to have them! What’s your price?!
